{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Address Verification Agent",
  "description": "Polaris Digitech Limited is a&nbsp;location intelligence firm that specializes in providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client&rsquo;s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Address Verification Agent
Job Locations:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT), Adamawa, Bauchi, Benue, Borno, Gombe, Jigawa, Kaduna, Kano, Katsina, Kebbi, Ikeja - Lagos, Nasarawa, Niger, Ogun, Sokoto, &amp; Taraba
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for agents within the listed States who will carry out address verification for banks and fintech customers within their locations in each state.
	The ideal candidate must have a functioning Android phone and have good knowledge of using Google Maps and digital applications for data collection.


Requirement


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to:&nbsp;careers@polarisdigitech.net&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  },

Customer Address Verification Agent Job at Polaris Digitech Limited




        
    

        
        Polaris Digitech Limited is a location intelligence firm that specializes in providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client’s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Address Verification Agent
Job Locations: Abuja (FCT), Adamawa, Bauchi, Benue, Borno, Gombe, Jigawa, Kaduna, Kano, Katsina, Kebbi, Ikeja - Lagos, Nasarawa, Niger, Ogun, Sokoto, & Taraba
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for agents within the listed States who will carry out address verification for banks and fintech customers within their locations in each state.
	The ideal candidate must have a functioning Android phone and have good knowledge of using Google Maps and digital applications for data collection.


Requirement


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Sales Officer",
  "description": "Cola Solar is a fast-growing renewable energy company committed to providing reliable and sustainable solar power solutions across Nigeria. Our mission is to empower businesses and households with clean, efficient energy while maintaining operational excellence and customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Description


	We are recruiting Sales Officerswithin Lagoswho are ambitious, results-driven, and passionate about growth.
	This role is ideal for driven individuals who want to earn beyond a fixed salary and grow rapidly within a forward-thinking organization.


Role Summary


	As a Sales Officer, you will play a key role in promoting our products/services, identifying new business opportunities, building customer relationships, and driving revenue.
	This is a performance-based role with a competitive basic salary plus commission, and it offers multiple opportunities for career advancement within the company.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, prospect, and secure new clients for the company.
	Maintain and grow relationships with existing customers.
	Meet and exceed monthly/quarterly sales targets.
	Conduct presentations, product demonstrations, and client follow-ups.
	Provide timely feedback and market intelligence to management.
	Represent the company with professionalism and integrity at all times.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc in Marketing, Business Administration, or related fields (preferred but not mandatory) with 3 years experience.
	Proven experience in sales, marketing, or customer relations within the Renewable Energysector is an advantage.
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
	Self-motivated, target-driven, and able to work independently.
	Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build trust with clients.
	Must be a resident within Onitsha for minimum of 1 year.


What We Offer


	Salary: N50,000 - N80,000 / Month + attractive commission structure.
	Multiple career growth and promotion opportunities within the company.
	Ongoing training and professional development.
	A dynamic and supportive work environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to:&nbsp;hr@colasolar.com&nbsp;using &quot;Application for Sales Officer&nbsp;- Onitsha&quot; as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-26",
  "employmentType": "Contract",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "ColaSolar"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "188731"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {

      "maxValue": 75000,

    }

}



Sales Officer Job at Cola Solar




        
    

        
        Cola Solar is a fast-growing renewable energy company committed to providing reliable and sustainable solar power solutions across Nigeria. Our mission is to empower businesses and households with clean, efficient energy while maintaining operational excellence and customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Officer
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Description
     

            
    




	We are recruiting Sales Officerswithin Lagoswho are ambitious, results-driven, and passionate about growth.
	This role is ideal for driven individuals who want to earn beyond a fixed salary and grow rapidly within a forward-thinking organization.


Role Summary


	As a Sales Officer, you will play a key role in promoting our products/services, identifying new business opportunities, building customer relationships, and driving revenue.
	This is a performance-based role with a competitive basic salary plus commission, and it offers multiple opportunities for career advancement within the company.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, prospect, and secure new clients for the company.
	Maintain and grow relationships with existing customers.
	Meet and exceed monthly/quarterly sales targets.
	Conduct presentations, product demonstrations, and client follow-ups.
	Provide timely feedback and market intelligence to management.
	Represent the company with professionalism and integrity at all times.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc in Marketing, Business Administration, or related fields (preferred but not mandatory) with 3 years experience.
	Proven experience in sales, marketing, or customer relations within the Renewable Energysector is an advantage.
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
	Self-motivated, target-driven, and able to work independently.
	Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build trust with clients.
	Must be a resident within Onitsha for minimum of 1 year.


What We Offer


	Salary: N50,000 - N80,000 / Month + attractive commission structure.
	Multiple career growth and promotion opportunities within the company.
	Ongoing training and professional development.
	A dynamic and supportive work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to: hr@colasolar.com using "Application for Sales Officer - Onitsha" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Product Engineer (UI/UX & Systems)",
  "description": "KloverHarris Limited is a leading business consulting and human resources company that specializes in providing comprehensive solutions in Learning and Development, HR Outsourcing, Business Consulting, and Information Technology. With a steadfast commitment to excellence and a customer-centric approach, we empower organizations to optimize their human resources, drive growth, and achieve sustainable success.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Product Engineer (UI/UX &amp; Systems)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki Phase1,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Digital Product Engineer (UI/UX &amp; Systems) is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performing digital products that are both visually engaging and technically sound.
	The role requires a unique blend of creativity, technical proficiency, and IT systems awareness &mdash; bridging the gap between design, development, and infrastructure.
	The incumbent will design user experiences, develop end-to-end software solutions, and ensure that systems and environments supporting these products operate securely and efficiently.
	This position demands a professional who can think strategically about product functionality while executing tactically through clean code, strong design logic, and reliable systems management.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and deploy responsive web applications using modern frameworks such as React, Vue, or Angular.
	Build and maintain server-side logic, APIs, and databases using Node.js, Python, PHP, or related technologies.
	Translate UI/UX prototypes and wireframes into functional, high-quality user interfaces.
	Conduct user research and testing to ensure usability, accessibility, and performance.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement technical and design requirements.
	Manage deployment processes, CI/CD pipelines, and ensure code integrity across environments.
	Administer basic IT systems, including workstation setups, software configurations, and network connectivity.
	Monitor cloud environments (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and maintain system performance and security.
	Implement data protection, backup, and recovery protocols to ensure business continuity.
	Troubleshoot and resolve application, server, and infrastructure issues in a timely manner.
	Maintain documentation for codebases, systems, and product design workflows.
	Mentor junior developers or designers and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.


Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Product usability and user satisfaction scores.
	Application stability, speed, and security.
	Code quality, maintainability, and adherence to standards.
	Efficiency and timeliness in product delivery.
	System uptime and reliability metrics.
	Quality of collaboration and documentation.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Design, or a related field.
	Minimum of three (3) years of experience in full-stack development with demonstrable UI/UX and IT systems experience.
	Proven portfolio showcasing design and development projects.
	Relevant certifications in cloud computing, UI/UX, or full-stack development are an advantage.


Required Skills and Competencies:


	Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and one or more modern frameworks (React, Vue, Angular).
	Proficient in at least one back-end technology such as Node.js, Django, Express, or Laravel.
	Experience with database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
	Familiarity with RESTful APIs, cloud hosting, and DevOps practices.
	Proficiency in UI/UX design tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch.
	Understanding of user-centered design principles, typography, and layout design.
	Knowledge of system administration tasks including software installation, troubleshooting, and network setup.
	Strong problem-solving ability and analytical mindset.
	Excellent communication, teamwork, and time management skills.
	Attention to detail, creativity, and adaptability in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidate should Send their&nbsp;&nbsp;CV to:&nbsp; Recruitment@kloverharris.com&nbsp; using &#39;&#39;Digital Product Engineer&nbsp;(UI/UX &amp; Systems)&#39;&#39;&nbsp;as the subject of the mail.",

Digital Product Engineer (UI/UX & Systems) Job at KloverHarris Limited




        
    

        
        KloverHarris Limited is a leading business consulting and human resources company that specializes in providing comprehensive solutions in Learning and Development, HR Outsourcing, Business Consulting, and Information Technology. With a steadfast commitment to excellence and a customer-centric approach, we empower organizations to optimize their human resources, drive growth, and achieve sustainable success.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Product Engineer (UI/UX & Systems)

Job Location: Lekki Phase1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Digital Product Engineer (UI/UX & Systems) is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performing digital products that are both visually engaging and technically sound.
	The role requires a unique blend of creativity, technical proficiency, and IT systems awareness — bridging the gap between design, development, and infrastructure.
	The incumbent will design user experiences, develop end-to-end software solutions, and ensure that systems and environments supporting these products operate securely and efficiently.
	This position demands a professional who can think strategically about product functionality while executing tactically through clean code, strong design logic, and reliable systems management.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and deploy responsive web applications using modern frameworks such as React, Vue, or Angular.
	Build and maintain server-side logic, APIs, and databases using Node.js, Python, PHP, or related technologies.
	Translate UI/UX prototypes and wireframes into functional, high-quality user interfaces.
	Conduct user research and testing to ensure usability, accessibility, and performance.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement technical and design requirements.
	Manage deployment processes, CI/CD pipelines, and ensure code integrity across environments.
	Administer basic IT systems, including workstation setups, software configurations, and network connectivity.
	Monitor cloud environments (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and maintain system performance and security.
	Implement data protection, backup, and recovery protocols to ensure business continuity.
	Troubleshoot and resolve application, server, and infrastructure issues in a timely manner.
	Maintain documentation for codebases, systems, and product design workflows.
	Mentor junior developers or designers and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.


Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Product usability and user satisfaction scores.
	Application stability, speed, and security.
	Code quality, maintainability, and adherence to standards.
	Efficiency and timeliness in product delivery.
	System uptime and reliability metrics.
	Quality of collaboration and documentation.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Design, or a related field.
	Minimum of three (3) years of experience in full-stack development with demonstrable UI/UX and IT systems experience.
	Proven portfolio showcasing design and development projects.
	Relevant certifications in cloud computing, UI/UX, or full-stack development are an advantage.


Required Skills and Competencies:


	Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and one or more modern frameworks (React, Vue, Angular).
	Proficient in at least one back-end technology such as Node.js, Django, Express, or Laravel.
	Experience with database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
	Familiarity with RESTful APIs, cloud hosting, and DevOps practices.
	Proficiency in UI/UX design tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch.
	Understanding of user-centered design principles, typography, and layout design.
	Knowledge of system administration tasks including software installation, troubleshooting, and network setup.
	Strong problem-solving ability and analytical mindset.
	Excellent communication, teamwork, and time management skills.
	Attention to detail, creativity, and adaptability in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidate should Send their  CV to:  Recruitment@kloverharris.com  using ''Digital Product Engineer (UI/UX & Systems)'' as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Sales Lead Job at Lacare Staffing Solutions




        
    

        
        Lacare Staffing Solutions - Our client, a reputable Manufacturing company, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Lead

Job Location: Magodo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND qualifications / Bachelor's Degree with 2 - 3 years of relevant work experience.


Salary
N180,000 - N200,000 monthly.
     

            
    



Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lacare247@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more inquiries contact the recruiter on: 09090643323
